nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Paused event is emitted every time the contract is paused
nodes.name: Paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Unpaused event is emitted every time the contract is unpaused
nodes.name: Unpaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor function
@param _aclAddress Address of the ACL contract to be used for authorization purposes
@dev Modifier restricts execution by requiring contract to be in an unpaused state
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier restricts execution by requiring contract to be in an paused state
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns whether the contract is paused
@return _isPaused Returns true if the contract is paused
nodes.name: isPaused

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the paused state of the contract
@param _isPaused New value of the paused state
nodes.name: setIsPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Pauses the contract execution
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Unpauses the contract execution
nodes.name: unpause
